sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing or using the SwiitchBank and SwiitchParty services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.

sections.heading: Description of Service
sections.content: Our services provide a platform for financial transactions, including but not limited to payments, transfers, and cryptocurrency exchanges. SwiitchParty is a feature that allows for peer-to-peer lending and borrowing.

sections.heading: User Conduct
sections.content: You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account. You agree to abide by all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.

sections.heading: Disclaimer of Warranties
sections.content: The service is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. We expressly disclaim all warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.
